---
title: "Age of Planes"
format: html
editor: visual
---



```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)

glimpse(flights)
glimpse(planes)
```



```{r}
plane_age <- planes %>% 
  mutate(age = 2013 - year) %>% 
  inner_join(flights, by = join_by(tailnum)) %>%
  left_join(airports, by = join_by(origin == faa)) %>%
  left_join(airports, by = join_by(dest == faa), suffix = c(".origin", ".dest")) %>% glimpse()
  
```
